text: Heinz Bigler (born 27 January 1949) is a retired Swiss football defender and later manager.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss footballers Category:BSC Young Boys players Category:FC Thun players Category:FC St. Gallen players Category:Association football defenders Category:Swiss football managers Category:FC St. Gallen managers Category:FC Schaffhausen managers Category:FC Gossau managers Category:FC Winterthur managers
title: Heinz Bigler (footballer, born 1949)
